channel.title: Operations on MicroShift.io
channel.description: Recent content in Operations on MicroShift.io

item.title: MicroShift Basic Usage
item.description: MicroShift operates similar to many other Kubernetes providers. This means that you can use the same tools to deploy and manage your applications.

item.title: Working With Private Registries
item.description: MicroShift may need access to a private registry. Access can be granted from registry login or from a pull-secret.
